name: Jackpot Poker by PokerStars
description: Enjoy non-stop casino poker action, from the biggest name in poker, PokerStars. Thanks to Jackpot Poker's fast-paced 3-player Spin & Go poker games, your next turn is not far away. With hundreds of tables and thousands of poker players, you get more excitement, more thrills, more poker!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: Pentium 4/Athlon 64 or faster CPU Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Screen resolution of 800x600 pixels, up-to-date graphics drivers Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 200 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or Higher Processor: 1.3 GHz Pentium 4/Athlon 64 or faster CPU Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Graphics driver support for OpenGL 2.0 and/or DirectX 9.0 or higher Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 200 MB available space
